turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hey, I need to check my account balance. Can you help with that?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! To verify your account balance, please provide the last four digits of the account you wish to check.  Also, please confirm your date of birth.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, I really hate having to do all these security checks. Fine. The last four digits are 1234, and my birthday is 01/01/1990. Now, what's my balance?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. Your current balance is $2,345.67. Is there anything else I can assist you with today? Also, for security reasons, would you like to set up 2-factor authentication for future logins? This will substantially improve your account security.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: That's great. Actually, while I have you, can you explain how the interest rate on my savings account is calculated? And, also, why is it so low these days?
